attributes.action: HM Government to implement a rule there should NOT be another EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details: No we don't want another EU referendum!
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to implement a rule that if the remain or leave vote is less than 60% based a turnout less than 75% there should NOT be another referendum. Being made aware or a petition to ask for a 2nd EU referendum this petition or vote is to counter act that request.
